content:
Wednesday October 21st, 2020 has been proposed for the next C-CDA IAT.

It's not to soon to be thinking about topics you might like to present. Visit the C-CDA Implementation-A-Thon Confluence Page to sign-up to lead to topic focused on solving an issue that your organization would find valuable to get addressed. We're looking for topics that help move the C-CDA information exchange community toward higher levels of data quality and consistency to promote greater interoperability. https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=5996832
